Our most digital version features all the garments in the collection: women’s, men’s and children’s clothing. What’s more, through notifications you can discover the latest products, enjoy exclusive offers and stay up to date with the latest trends in online fashion. 

Choose your favourites with the app! Download it free and enjoy a unique experience in mobile format. 

Fashion on your mobile. 

Wherever you are, log on quickly to get your must-haves. Browse through the different collections featured, be inspired by the proposed outfits in each editorial and find what you are looking for by using the size, colour and price filters. Your online shopping bag can be accessed from any device.

Exclusive information

Manage your account. 

Log on to your profile and edit your personal data whenever you like, for example the delivery address. You can also track all your orders and manage any returns. 

The MANGO app is much more than an online store. Shop in a simple and secure way.

Get gifts right, every time! Make and share wish lists in a family group you create - for birthdays, Christmas holiday, baby, and weddings.

Unlike other wish list apps, Giftster makes your whole family's gift giving experiences more fun and less stressful.

Only with Giftster can you invite family members to join a private group you create. 

Everyone can view and shop each other's wish lists all in one place, and mark things purchased to avoid duplicate gifts. Gift status is hidden from the list maker, keeping the surprise.

The IOS App has a companion website that runs in your Safari browser or on your phone or  computer desktop with all the same data and features.  You and your family can use  Giftster from any phone, tablet or computer to view and shop lists.

“I searched iTunes and played around with a few different apps and the one wish list app that has really worked for me that I am loving is called Giftster…was not only easy for me to use but easy for my family to use as well.”  --  Laura Wittmann, orgjunkie.com

Giftster is the original lifetime gift registry, connecting family and close friends around gift giving occasions. Set it up once and use it year after year.

Features and Benefits

* Invite your family members to join your own private gift idea sharing group

* Join an existing group created from the app or the giftster.com website.  

* Add a Secret Santa draw to your group at giftster.com and discover your secret pick and Secret Santa rules on your iOS device.  Exclude picks and reuse a previous draw, too.

*  Choice of privacy settings - make your lists private, shared only with groups, or public - for everyone to see in search or only those who have your list link

* Mark gift ideas reserved or purchased so others don’t buy a duplicate gift

* The list maker cannot see the status of items on their own lists

* Add gift ideas to other member's lists, hidden from the list maker but everyone else can see them.  How fun is that?

* Avoid duplicate gifts, poor gift choices, or having to rely only on gift cards

* Adding an item to your list is as simple as jotting an idea on a piece of paper

* Rank gift ideas with a 5 star system

* Use Giftster just for your own wishlists, and decide to share them later

* Use public lists to make shopping your birthday, wedding or baby registry easy for others who are not Giftster members

* Simple to invite other to join using your device’s address book

* Already a member at giftster.com? Log in the same way and all your lists, groups, and events are instantly visible on your device.


How Giftster works

With Giftster you become part of a small social network connecting family and close friends around gift giving occasions.

If this is your first time using Giftster, you won't have any family or friends connected yet. 

Once you connect one or more of your family into a group, each family member logs in to update their own wish lists, and to view and reserve gifts on each other’s lists.

- Everyone in your family can connect to you with this App - we built a version of Giftster that runs on just about every device. 

- Giftster instantly synchronizes changes to all devices, including your account at giftster.com. 

- Requires internet access via cellular data or wifi to operate.
